definitions.definition: A cordial syrup made from pomegranates .
A dilute drink made from this syrup.
A thin gauzy fabric of silk or wool , used for women's clothing and men's woven luxury ties .
A dyestuff consisting essentially of impure fuchsine .

main_definition: A cordial syrup made from pomegranates .
secondary_definitions: A dilute drink made from this syrup.
A thin gauzy fabric of silk or wool , used for women's clothing and men's woven luxury ties .
( dated , formerly a trade name ) A dyestuff consisting essentially of impure fuchsine .
